page.title: 08A DAY IN MY LIFE-WASHINGTON
page.content: On a{Thursday}morning I get up at 8:00am. Then I get washed and put my clothes on. Then I have my breakfast,brush my hair and go to school. First we have assembly then go back to th class and have English. At 10:30am we go out to play. My friends and I normally walk about. After play we have P.E. At noon I have dinner and do organ practice. At 1:15 pm I return to school. We do topic work. At 2:40 pm we go out to play. After play we finish topic work and at 3:30 pm we go home. At home I go out to play until 6:00 pm then I have my tea. After tea I have a shower, then watch T.V. I normally watch 'Top of the Pops' and the Lenny Henry Show. After that I go upstairs, read until I am tired, then go to sleep.
